      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030906</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030906</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Mecanismo de control de glucosa en sangre</string>
            <string language="en">Blood glucose control mechanism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blutglukosesteuereinheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mécanisme de commande de glucose de sang</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mecanismo do controle do glucose do sangue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Meccanismo di controllo del glucosio di anima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μηχανισμός ελέγχου γλυκόζης αίματος</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación en la que el alumno tiene que descubrir cómo se controla constante la cantidad de glucosa en sangre y qué enfermedad se produce si estos niveles no son bien controlados.</string>
            <string language="en">Research in which the student has to discover how there is a constant control of the amount of glucose in the blood and what illness is caused when these levels are not well controlled..</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Control glucosa</string>
            <string language="en">glucose control</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Reino Animal</string>
            <string language="en">Animal kingdom</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung, in der der Kursteilnehmer entdecken 
muß, wie es eine konstante Steuerung der Menge der Glukose im Blut 
gibt und welche Krankheit verursacht wird, wenn diese Stufen nicht 
wohles kontrolliertes sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche dans laquelle l'étudiant doit 
découvrir comment il y a une commande constante de la quantité de 
glucose dans le sang et quelle maladie est causée quand ces niveaux 
ne sont pas maîtrise des puits.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesquisa em que o estudante tem que descobrir 
como há um controle constante da quantidade de glucose no sangue e 
que doença é causada quando estes níveis não forem controlados 
bom.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca in cui l'allievo deve scoprire quanto ci 
è un controllo costante della quantità di glucosio nell'anima e che 
malattia è causata quando questi livelli non sono controllato buono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να ανακαλύψει 
πόσο υπάρχει ένας σταθερός έλεγχος του ποσού γλυκόζης στο αίμα
και ποια ασθένεια προκαλείται όταν δεν ελέγχονται καλά αυτά τα 
επίπεδα ..</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glukosesteuerung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tierkönigreich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">commande de glucose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
